metadata.Title: CVE-2021-28658 on Ubuntu 18.04 ESM (bionic) - low.
metadata.Description:
In Django 2.2 before 2.2.20, 3.0 before 3.0.14, and 3.1 before 3.1.8, MultiPartParser allowed directory traversal via uploaded files with suitably crafted file names. Built-in upload handlers were not affected by this vulnerability.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2021-28658` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

python-django - 1:1.11.11-1ubuntu1.12
python-django-common - 1:1.11.11-1ubuntu1.12
python3-django - 1:1.11.11-1ubuntu1.12
No subscription required

criterions.comment: python-django package in bionic was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '1:1.11.11-1ubuntu1.12').
